item.title: Tools I use
item.description: List of software I use daily at work : AutoHotkey: Autohotkey provides a scriptable way to automate most of the management of my Windows XP. I currently use one script that enable X-Windows style window dragging/resizing. Thunderbird Firefox Google Calendar Sync QuickMonth Calendar Putty SuperCopier Launchy
